name: Lolguides
body:
# Lolguides
Python code that fetches guide data from clgaming.net, solomid.net and lolpro.com into a json dump. Also python code that generates the html pages for [lolguides.net](http://lolguides.net) based on the json data.

Be sure to follow [lolguides on twitter](https://twitter.com/#!/Lolguidesnet) and [G+](https://plus.google.com/111118564432197584206) for developer updates and LoL news.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
